title: Non riesco ad aggiungere un account GMAIL a thunderbird
content: Quando lo faccio mi viene rifiutato per errore di login o password. Ma se vado sul web ed entro con quelle STESSE login e password sono accettato e visualizzo regolarmente le mie email. Avebo già l'account attivo e funzionanbte su Thunderbird ma da circa un mese fa se cercavo di visualizzare le email cliccando su "messaggi in arrivo" non accadeva più niente e vedevo solo il cursore rotante in attesa infinita di qualcosa. Ho quindi deciso di cancellare l'accounto e di riaggiungerlo, ma il risultato è stato quello che ho detto all'inizio. Spero che qualcuno sappia aiutarmi a risolvere.

title: Sending mail error, when I didn't send one
content:
Hi,

That's the third time in a few days I got this error : Sending failed; Une erreur est survenue lors de l’envoi de l’e-mail : erreur du serveur SMTP. Le serveur a répondu : mail.gandi.net Error: timeout exceeded., exitCode=2153066732, originalMsgURI=imap-message://myname%40mydomain.com@mail.gandi.net/INBOX#4356 (from log error, the erro windows only state the sending error and the timeout)

I didn't send any mail today, and the last one in my inbox is number 4354 so I don't understand why I got this message and what mail is it about.

Thanks for any information !

creator: hfayersjr

title: 'új lap' probléma
content:
Kedves Mindenki!

Úgy használom a Thunderbirdöt, hogy azokat a maileket, amelyekkel külön is kell foglalkoznom új lapon nyitom meg. Az új verzióban azonban rendszeresen előfordul, hogy néha csak úgy, néha újraindulásnál (pl. frissítés) "Probléma az oldal betöltésével" szöveg jelenik meg, így még arra sincs esélyem, hogy megtaláljam melyik üzenetről is van szó. Találkozott más is ezzel? Hogy lehetne orvosolni? Előre is nagyon köszönöm a segítséget.

Nekem még nem igazán sikerült megbarátkoznom az új verzióval... :-(

Tisztelettel: Honti György

Update: Eddig, ha nem is jelent meg az üzenet legalább kiírta, hogy melyik .eml fájlról van szó. Mostmár csak egy üres oldal jelenik meg hibaüzenet nélkül "Probléma az oldal betöltése közben" fejléccel, de hol úgy, hogy oldalt látszik egy szürke csík, mintha a fastruktúrát szeretné betölteni, néha még ez sem.

Sajnos nem vagyok itt jártas. Egy korábbi kérdésemre azonnal kaptam választ, ezt a mostanit mintha senkise olvasta volna.... Köszönöm előre a segítséget.
creator: honti

title: U2F key login to Gmail doesn't work
content:
Good morning, I am using Thunderbird 115.2.2 (64 bit) Windows 11 and I cannot add new Gmail accounts that are secured by Google Advanced Protection (I have to use a U2F key to log in)/

When adding a new Google account in Thunderbird, after entering the password, information appears to use a U2F key and then the error "Chrome extension not found" appears and the install extension button which leads to a broken website https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ gnubbyd/beknehfpfkghjoafdifaflglpjkojoco which shows 404. An error occurred.

The requested URL could not be found on this server. That's all we know.


I tried uninstalling and reinstalling thunderbird, test-installing versions from the Microsoft store, and even formatting the computer and currently I am unable to add any Google account secured with a U2F yubikey key :( I use Google translator



Dzień dobry, używam Thunderbird 115.2.2 (64 bity) Windows 11 i nie mogę dodać nowych kont Gmail które są zabezpieczone przez Ochronę Zaawansowaną Google (muszę użyć klucza U2F do logowania)/

Podczas dodawania nowego konta Google w Thunderbird po wpisaniu hasła wyskakuje informacja żeby użyć klucza U2F a następnie pojawia się błąd "Nie znaleziono rozszerzenia Chrome" oraz przycisk zainstaluj rozszerzenie który prowadzi do niedziałającej strony https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/gnubbyd/beknehfpfkghjoafdifaflglpjkojoco na której wyświetla się 404. Wystąpił błąd.

Nie udało się znaleźć żądanego adresu URL na tym serwerze. To wszystko, co wiemy.


Próbowałem odinstalować i ponownie zainstalować thunderbird, instalowałem testowo wersje z microsoft store, a nawet formatowałem komputer i obecnie nie jestem w stanie dodać żadnego konta Google zabezpieczonego kluczem U2F yubikey :( Używam tłumacza google

title: Cannot change inbox location to another folder
content:
After updating Thunderbird on my main machin (pc1), my inbox was suddenly empty. On another computer (let's call it pc2) that has access to the same account, the inbox shows all messages correctly. The difference seems to be this: When I go to "Inbox" -> "properties" -> "General Information", the field "Location" on pc2 is set to "imap://...imap.gmx.net/INBOX". On pc1 that same field is set to "mailbox://...path to local profiles folder". The inbox file of the local profiles folder contains nothing, so I assume that this is the reason for the empty inbox. My problem is that this "Location" field cannot be edited; I can only select and copy the text. So my question is: how can I change this field?

Kind Regards and thank you for your support.
creator: nicolaslook

title: Outlook is blocking Thunderbird. This happened today.
content:
This is an EMERGENCY. We moved and had to change email. GMX does not work with Thunderbird. I finally settled on Outlook. Now today after we have used Outlook for two months, it has blocked Thunderbird. I have spent two months notifying all my contacts about the new email and now it is sabotaged by Microsoft.

I see a question from last year, but I see no resolution for someone like me who only wanted a new email. Outlook seemed to accept my password, but messages are STILL blocked.

While I was looking for a new email address, I read on THIS FORUM that Gmail did not work well with Thunderbird. What on earth can I do? I am elderly, but use email constantly. I can't believe I have to change again and notify all contacts again. It is a lot of work and embarrassing for me.

title: Interlinea Pannello Cartelle/account
content: Salve, ho da poco installato la ver. 115.2.2 di Thunderbird. Non riesco a trovare una visualizzazione giusta della interlinea nel pannello delle cartelle. Rispetto alla ver. precedente risulta esserci molto piu spazio verticale ed avendo svariati account devo sempre scendere col mouse. Sto' utilizzando la Densità predefinita che a mio parere è giusta per la lettura del pannello mail. creator: m.chiarelli

title: "Mark" button no  longer toggles
content:
In the newest version of Thunderbird the ability to toggle the read/unread status via the "Mark" button has gone away. The Mark button now summons a drop down menu of options.

I use my mail to enter customer orders. I open a letter and copy the data to my order screen, then I mark the letter as read. I've been doing this for years. Now I hit the button and nothing happens.

I know I can use the tiny green dots in the header row as a toggle but they are difficult to target because of size and when the header is highlighted they are no longer green. I know there is a keyboard shortcut but I'm a one-finger typist and that means I have to look down at my keyboard and find the "M". I really want to do this as a mouse action.

Is there any way to turn a keyboard shortcut into a button?

Or to modify the "Mark" button to restore the toggle function?

I can't seem to stop myself from pressing the Mark button just once and then becoming distracted because the read status doesn't toggle.
creator: reg30

title: Unable to send out mailings to sub groups in Thunderbird Supernova
content:
With previous versinons of Thunderbird my wife was able to send out mailings to The main list and the sub groups. Yesterday in the latest version of Thunderbird call "Supernova" was installed on our desktop. Now she is only able to send to the main mailinglist but not to sub groups. The usual way of sending out to groups ie 1. click write 2. click view - which brings up the sidebar, then bringing up the specific group, then clicking edit, then select all.......... no longer works. The problem is the final stage ie "select all" doesn't "select all" to highlight the group names. so she can no longer send out to a sub groups.

What's the answer please? She was happy with the previous Thunderbird version which worked well, Why can she no longer send out to sub groups in "Supernova" ?

It's really frustrating and time consuming.

title: TB 115.2.2 on Mac: notifications for email in Inbox subfolders
content:
I am using Thunderbird 115.2.2 on a Mac running macOS 13.5.2 and am using IMAP to collect my email. My Thunderbird settings for notifications when new email arrives are:

  • to animate the dock icon when new mail arrives and to show the count of unread messages;
  • to play a sound.

My macOS notification settings for Thunderbird allow notifications and enable badges, sounds and banners (including on the lock screen).

I’m very pleased with TB 115—which brought me back after ten years using another email client. I have one small issue which I suspect is more a request for an enhancement than it is a bug report.

I have four subfolders of my inbox to which specific emails are routed (by Thunderbird message filters) when downloaded by Thunderbird. When an email is routed by a TB filter to a subfolder I receive a visual macOS notification and hear the relevant sound. However, the app icon does not show a figure for the unread email.

I assume the app icon figure for unread emails applies only to emails in the inbox itself. If that is the case it would be a really nice enhancement for it also to cover unread items in subfolders of the inbox. On the other hand, of course, it’s also quite possible that I’m doing something wrong!

Stephen

title: Confusion of headers/etc. on some emails after upgrade to 115.2.2
content:
I recently upgraded from the 102 series to the new 115.2.2. I did not use the automatic upgrade. I downloaded the code from the website and manually installed it over my old version. For the most part, things are working. My 4 IMAP accounts all appeared in the new version pretty much as they were before. I decided to keep using the new version. However, I later discovered one annoying issue. For some emails, when I click on them to read them, the line in the listing above does not change from bold to standard text, indicating the email has been read. Further, the header part of the email (containing the From, To, etc. and options like Reply and Delete) either does not appear at all, or I see the header from the last email that I read.

I have attached a screen shot. Notice that in the screenshot I am reading a newsletter from Edward Montalvo, XQ Extra. The email shows in the viewing pane. However, the header that shows is from the prior email in the list, a personal email from Wally Field. I am not sure what would happen if I select something like Delete at this point.

This only happens on certain emails. Most of them work fine. To date, it has always occurred on some kind of newsletter or advertising type email. I am seeing that many people are having more serious issues with the new version. However, any advice is appreciated. Perhaps this will provide some clues as to some underlying issues in the indexing or message processing that may be behind other problems, also.
creator: marklang

title: Need help with migration, will pay
content:
I tried asking this before and got no answers, so let me reword and try again.

A Microsoft rep convinced me my Windows was too corrupt to fix and made me reinstall Windows, which meant losing all my programs. He promised all my files and folders would be intact.

On Thunderbird, I had two types of accounts-- I have domain-based email, and previously, it was a POP3 account with all the emails downloading to my hard drive and then deleting from the server. Years and years of emails that way.

Then I switched to a different domain server and my email is now IMAP-based and saved to the server.

I have all the IMAP emails. The ones on my hard drive are no longer in Thunderbird. I tried using the import feature to load up what I think is the correct profile (from Windows.old), and it just gives an "unexpected error" message or installs blank folders. I can see the profile folder and it has 20 gigs in the inbox. It's not blank!

I need help, desperately. I can't lose all those old emails. I will pay someone to fix this for me but don't even know who to ask, because I don't want to spend the money and then find out that no one knows what to do. Please help!
creator: mommajay

title: Message comes in as garbled in the body
content:
After the update from version 102 to 115, some messages are coming in as garbled. See the attachment. This is more prevalent in version 115 now. Previously used to happen in version 102 and prior, but somehow stopped, although it does happen from time to time.

Now it has come back with many more garbled messages.

The from, subject, date and time are all missing.

Also in the previous versions 102 and before, the File menu used to be at the top, This supernova version brought Mail Space menu at the top instead, and I prefer the File Menu bar to be at the TOP. How do I do that? See attachment.
creator: pasteltiara

title: Earthink SMTP error messages, can't send
content:
Hi folks,

I've been using Thunderbird successfully with my Earthlink email for a couple of months (Windows 10)

Today suddenly, sending stopped working. Here's the error message:

Sending of the message failed. The Outgoing server (SMTP) smtpauth.earthlink.net does not support the selected authentication method. Please change the 'Authentication method' in 'Account Settings | Outgoing Server (SMTP)

I have the correct settings for Earthlink (STARTTLS, port 587), and sending has been fine until today.

When it first happened, I rebooted the PC and then it started working again.

Trying again later, it stopped being able to send.

Someone posted that the issue can be solved by sending and receiving insecurely, but that is not a solution!

I was also using Encrypted Password with no problem, and today that started causing an error message, forcing me to reset to Normal Password.
creator: valaoritis

title: Inline table editing in the Compose window
content:
Hi,

Whenever I use tables in a message, I'm annoyed by the little controls that allow to insert/remove rows and columns inline (see attached image for example).

I've enabled userChrome.css in Thunderbird by setting toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets to True.

Then I inspected those little elements and a typical control looks like: a[_moz_anonclass="mozTableAddColumnBefore"]

But I cannot seem to affect those elements using userChrome.css or userContent.css. For example: a[_moz_anonclass="mozTableAddColumnBefore"] {display:none !important} does nothing.

The CSS rules related to those elements seem to be stored in a file called EditorOverride.css but I guess it's a temp file because I cannot find it on my computer.

Any ideas on solving this issue? Thanks!

title: How to re-download all Google calendar events in Thunderbird Lightning
content:
I'm using Google calendar in Thunderbird Lightning.

Sometimes when I add an event to the Google calendar itself (e.g. on my phone), the added event doesn't show up in Lightning. Clicking the "Reload all calendars and synchronise changes" button doesn't help. Clicking the three dots next to the calendar and selecting "Synchronise" doesn't help. Closing and restarting Thunderbird doesn't help.

I am able to see the added event if I "unsubscribe" from the calendar and re-add it, but I don't want to have to do this. This method is only helpful if I know an event has not synchronised.

Is there a way to "hard" re-download all calendar events?

By "hard" I mean to delete all events from Thunderbird Lightning's memory and re-download all events from the server, in a way similar to unsubscribing and re-adding the calendar, but without having to do that?
creator: pavel.sluka
